general.settings_not_saved: Settings not saved. An error occured.
general.title: Title
general.name: Name

search.add_manga_sub: Get started by adding your favorite manga to the library.
search.import_title_sub: Here you can import your collection from CBZ or CBR files. You can import multiples archives at once. But only one manga per upload.
search.click_here: Click here and choose your files to upload
search.select_manga: Select the manga for this import

empty.title: It's a Bit Empty Here!
empty.subtitle:
It seems like your manga collection is empty. Don't worry, I'm here to help you.
 Just hit that 'Search Manga' button to get started. 📚âœ¨.

integration.title: Integrations
integration.subtitle: Here you can configure your integrations with other services.
integration.scrobblers_subtitle: Scrobblers are used to automatically update your reading progress on other services.
integration.scrobblers_settings_subtitle: Here you can configure your scrobblers.
integration.token_tip: Click on click on Authorize then paste the token here.
integration.exclude_genres_tip: Enter the genres you want to exclude from the sync.

manga.delete_manga_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this manga?
manga.manga_not_deleted: Manga not deleted. An error occurred.
manga.manga_has_being_deleted: has been deleted from your library.
manga.chapter_replace_confirm: Are you sure you want to replace this chapter?
manga.chapter_pending_download: A new chapter will be downloaded.
manga.chapter_pending_message: has been added to the download queue.

settings.security_desc: Require Username and Password to access Teemii.
settings.advanced_features_desc: Advanced features are a set of Teemii features that includes, for ex., the ability to upscale chapter page.
settings.waifu2x_help: Allow upscale of cover and chapter page.
settings.agents_options_desc: Behaviour of Teemii agents. Define how Teemii will behave when looking for metadata, covers, banners, etc.
settings.agents_authentications_desc: Some agents require authentication to work properly. You can configure them here. If you don't have an account for an agent, leave the fields blank.
settings.agents_teemii_api_key: Teemii API Key (early preview - sponsors only)
settings.agents_teemii_api_key_desc: Required to get access to Teemii indexer.
settings.backup_desc: Manage the backup of your settings using built-in backup.
settings.schedulers_desc: Schedulers are used to run tasks at a specific time.
settings.restart_backend_desc: Are you sure you want to restart the backend? It will stop all running tasks.
settings.restore_backup_desc: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? It will overwrite your current database and settings.
settings.backup_restore_error: An error occurred while restoring the backup.
settings.backup_download_error: An error occurred while downloading the backup.
settings.backup_launched_error: An error occurred while launching the backup.
settings.restore_launched_error: An error occurred while launching the restore.
settings.settings_not_saved: Settings not saved. An error occurred.
settings.job_not_found_desc: The job you are looking for does not exist.
settings.job_on_demand_desc: Your job execution has been scheduled now.
settings.user_interface_desc: Customize the look and feel of Teemii.

login.welcome_subtitle: Please sign in to continue to Teemii.
